casebody.data:
NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD v. R. C. HOILES et al. No. 2119. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit Aug. 5, 1940. Robert B. Watts, of Washington, D. C-, Acting Gen. Counsel, National Labor Relations Board, for petitioner. Otto Smith, of Clovis, N. M., for respondent.

Before PHILLIPS and LEWIS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Petition for enforcement dismissed, on motion of petitioner and pursuant to stipulation.
